pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Rick Porcello; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .249 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .317 off him after that.
Dangerous count for Rick Porcello; Eric Hosmer is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .919 OPS against them this season and .774 against everything else.
